jd:
Hi, Please find the job description below:

Job Title: Oracle database performance tester
Location: Fremont CA
Must: preferred local candidates.

Required skills:
- 6-8 years of Performance testing experience in Oracle EBS or any EBS systems.
- Tests against Web applications, web services, and SQL Server.
- Mandatory experience in any R12 upgrade project at least 1 project.
- Extensive experience with HP testing tools (Load Runner, Quicktest professional, Winrunner, and Performance Center) to design and execute load and performance tests against Web applications, web services and SQL Server.
- Write and prepare technical performance test plans.
- Develop data-driven test automation scripts and execute performance and load testing.
- Design and execute daily load BVTs as well as larger, system-level tests.
- Prepare data for execution.
- Analyze data gathered from performance tests.
- Report findings and log defects.
- Define Performance Testing Objectives and Scope.
- Design a Performance Test Plan and Strategy.
- Develop Performance Test Scripts and Scenarios.
- Configure and Manage the Performance Test Environment.
- Assessing the Service Level Agreement and Objectives.
- Identifying Testing Parameters.
- Prepare and Load Test Data.
- Execute Performance Tests.
- Applying Consistent Monitoring Metrics.
- Analyze Performance Test Results.
- Generate and present performance Test Reports.
- Identify Non-Functional Requirements for Performance Testing.
- Locate Performance Obstructions and Root Causes.
- Collaborate and Communicate with Other Team Members in Performance Testing.
- Review and Update Performance Testing Artifacts for Accuracy and Completeness.
- Working knowledge of testing methodologies (agile, waterfall, etc.).
- Experience with test management tools, such as JIRA, Quality Center, or TestRail.
